content:
Posted: September 16, 2016



YouTube™ Video: Steam Cleaning - Snowcat Simulator 

			Views: 26		

			Despite it's name, this game is not about playing domesticated snow leopards. It is infact a vehicle simulation game where players are tasked to do basic labor jobs framed around a ski resort.		

Despite it's name, this game is not about playing domesticated snow leopards.  It is infact a vehicle simulation game where players are tasked to do basic labor jobs framed around a ski resort.As a simulator the game immediately fails by not providing an accurate physics system.  Vehicles are light and bouncy the snow has no mass or volume.  All this cause the experience to feel fake and painted on instead of an actual simulation.Additionally the generic vehicles lack any identification that combined with missing UI elements results in a lot of guesswork for players to figure out what vehicles are and how to use them.

Posted: October 24, 2015
												This game... my friends: one hour of gameplay feels like 12 hours. If you wanna have "fun" for a very long time, go and get it! A nice feature to extend the gameplay: save the game and you'll lose all your fuel. Very funny when you're at the end of the map and have to drive with amazing !!10Km/h!! back to the base!!! The controls are AMAZING and the mechanics are so creative!!! BUY IT!!!
